attributes.action: Demand a national Referendum on Government policy concerning net zero policy
attributes.additional_details: I therefore require the government of the day,  to seek the approval of the British people for this net zero policy.   Via a national Referendum, using the question, do you agree to the government’s current policy on Net-zero?   Voting in a general election when all major parties subscribe to this policy is NOT consent.   Seek consent from the British people with a national Referendum.  We are a democracy.
attributes.background: Whilst in office, the Rt Hon Tony Blair, made an arbitrary decision that the science around man-made climate change was settled.  Since then,  “man-made” has been dropped,  and the goal posts have consistently changed.   To penalise the people for the whims of politicians is wrong

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636066
